section.name: Overview of the Custom Portal Directory Structure
section.p: The directory structure for developing a custom Jetspeed portal is designed to be similar to the directory structure of the Jetspeed-2 core source tree.
Note that this directory structure only covers the custom portal itself. Each portlet is a separate project with its own directory structure.
Here is an overview of directories (directories are relative to the custom portal project root):

tr.td: Distributable files(wars, jars) created during the build, such as installers or web applications
Customized installation script for the Jetexpress installer
Jetspeed XML seed data to provide initial test data for the portal(user, roles, profiling rules...)
Page decorations (skins) to brand the custom portal (CSS, images, HTML)
Page decorations (skins) to brand the custom portal (CSS, images, HTML)
The collection of folders and pages that make up the Portal Site for the Jetexpress portal
Temporary build area used by Ant

td.div: Place the web application here that are required to run the jetexpress portal
